entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Entity
      • entity.Player

  • public class Player
extends Entity

    Player

    Parent Entity

    The implementation of the Player entity.

    The Player class is a sub class of Entity. Implements entities update method

    Since:
    2017-11-29
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    August B. Sandoval, Kevin Bornemeier, Josiah Salas
